entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
